com.gej.map

Class MapLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.map.MapLayer

  • public class MapLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A layer of the map. Used to draw the objects in the order of depth.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
